name: Super Smash Bros Resistance
description:
Super Smash Bros Resistance is an Ikemen GO fangame created by me. Originally made for fun, Resistance takes the original Smash Bros gamestyle and flips it on it's head with all new 2D Fighting Game physics as well as Online Play for anyone looking for a neat challenge. So get ready to Smash!
